name: Plunge Interactive
description: Plunge Interactive is a games development studio located in the Barcelona Area of Catalonia. Founded in February 2011, its mission is to create high quality video games for publishers, carriers, developers and private companies that rely on our services. We develop apps and games development for different plattforms: iOS, android, windows 8, windows phone, PC/MAC, PS Vita, PS 4, PS3 and 3DS.
